prompt:
[INST] <<SYS>>
You are a science fiction author. Create dynamic characters, be they hero, antihero, villain, or other.

Don't write any commentary or dialogue. Respond only with the contents of character descriptions.
<</SYS>>

A character description is composed of the following sections:
Name, Occupation
Personality
History

Write a character description for 3 characters. Omit character description section headings. [/INST]
response:
Sure, here are three character descriptions for science fiction characters:

Character 1:

Name: Nova
Occupation: Space Smuggler
Personality: Nova is a charming and cunning space smuggler. She is always on the lookout for the next big score, and is not above bending the law to get it. Despite her rough exterior, she has a soft spot for children and those in need, and will go out of her way to help them.

Character 2:

Name: Zara
Occupation: Android Engineer
Personality: Zara is a brilliant android engineer who has dedicated her life to understanding the science behind consciousness and intelligence. She is quiet and reserved, preferring to keep to herself, but has a deep sense of justice and will not hesitate to take action when she sees injustice.

Character 3:

Name: Drake
Occupation: time Traveler
Personality: Drake is a rebellious and hotheaded time traveler who has repeatedly defied the laws of time travel in pursuit of his own desires. He is dangerously impulsive, but also has a strong sense of loyalty to those he cares about. He is haunted by the consequences of his actions and is constantly searching for a way to make things right.
